title: 3 Simple Steps to Build Diagonal Stairs in Terraria

steps.title: Craft a wooden hammer.
steps.content: Craft a wooden hammer. Collect 8 wood blocks and stand next to the work bench. Use the Inventory's crafting menu. [1] X Research source If desired, you can use an anvil to craft other types of hammers.

steps.title: Place down platforms diagonally.
steps.content: Place down platforms diagonally. This is the typical layout of stairs. However, you can create stairs going any direction as long as they are close enough to connect. The platform can be any material from another Biome , such as wood, bone, bamboo, etc.

steps.title: Use the hammer on the platforms.
steps.content: Use the hammer on the platforms. This will connect the platforms and create stairs. Be sure to use the hammer on each individual platform; otherwise, your character will fall through. [2] X Research source If you're creating stairs for a house, you can craft a bed to set it as your new spawn point. You can also make other crafting stations, such as a loom and sawmill .
